max_drawdown_estimate.comment: Expected 1Y peak-to-trough drawdown ~22.5%, with plausible range 20-35% and stress tail >40%.

confidence.label: medium
confidence.notes: Company release data high confidence; aggregator valuation/fundamental snapshots moderate confidence; technicals reproducible from Yahoo historical prices.

thesis: IBM shows improved growth breadth, margin expansion, and strong free cash flow. Current technical setup is weak/oversold, but medium-term risk-reward is positive if software-led growth and AI monetization continue and consulting stabilizes.
risk_flags: Relatively high leverage versus pure software peers
Elevated near-term volatility and trend breakdown
